entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 4:05 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
